html: 3.4.17  7:04 am   how can you describe your music? i want to get your sound but I don't know where to start

3.4.17  6:49 am   Are you gonna post the video the moment you finish it?

I usually wait and watch it again the next morning since I'll catch mistakes easier that way.
3.4.17  5:40 am   I am 99% that your next video will be about Europe. Is it correct?
3.4.17  5:13 am   what effects do you use?
3.4.17  5:01 am   how's doing the score compared to the graphics? must be exciting times amirite?
3.4.17  3:51 am   how do you know that the video will be 19 minutes long if you don't have all the audio recorded yet?

3.4.17  1:10 am   If you had to choose between having absolutely perfect pitch but always getting annoyed when someone is out of tune at all, or always being out of tune but being able to enjoy music as you do now, what would you choose?

Also, how do you like your eggs? Fried? Scrambled? Boiled? Entirely raw?
3.4.17  12:18 am   did it take you a long time to learn video editing
3.4.17  12:12 am   Is the first word of the new video going to be "hi" or "hello"?
3.3.17  11:47 pm   Will the video be out before Autumn?
3.3.17  11:34 pm   you said you get questions about penguins almost daily. then how come I only see them a couple times a month?

3.3.17  11:28 pm   Don't let those people stop you from posting things on Instagram! It really doesn't spoil the video. It's gonna be long and wild and crazy and there's no way that 30+ pictures can encapsulate the thrill of watching the completed video. I mean, I've seen History of Japan countless times and there are still little details that I missed before. So, do whatever you wanted to do. Do you agree?
3.3.17  10:35 pm   was the december 2016 release date ever a realistic option?

3.3.17  10:16 pm   when answering questions about the video not being done sooner and not uploading other videos, i've seen you call yourself a terrible person. why so?

do you think that it should have been done sooner and you believe you're slacking?

do you think that as a content creator, we deserve videos in the meantime until the history video is uploaded?

or is was it just a joke? i hope you take as much time thats needed to make the video so it turns out better.
3.3.17  9:35 pm   Are you gonna make a trailer for the video ur working on?
3.3.17  8:33 pm   in the new video, is the date 1337 mentioned.?
3.3.17  8:19 pm   bill i hope you realise that you are about to upload what will become a very popular video. it will become the thing of legends
3.3.17  8:00 pm   do you know anyone in the real world(tm) who can help you catch mistakes in the video before you release it. (ie someone who can't steal the video)
3.3.17  7:32 pm   how many dog have you eatten in the last minute
3.3.17  7:30 pm   Please help me
3.3.17  7:23 pm   whats the reason you started keeping an audio journal? when do you think its a good idea for a person to do it?
3.3.17  7:02 pm   ur reality thing is an awesome rollercoaster, will u ever do more? it'd be cool to see your thought process through the making of this colossal project

3.3.17  6:35 pm   I am subscribed to your channel Why did you make some music? Was it some person, inspiration, or just creatvity? Also, are you planning on dedicating time to music or another thing you like to do? Also, do you like dogs?
3.3.17  6:31 pm   do you think you've had the biggest freak out panic attack of your life?
3.3.17  6:08 pm   When is the video coming out?! Could you give us a specific date?
3.3.17  5:50 pm   It seems that the longer you work on a project, the more you pressure yourself to complete it as quickly as possible. Am I wrong?
3.3.17  3:27 pm   How do you feel about the moon?

3.3.17  3:25 pm   What is your favorite song written thus far?

Are there particular binders you favor over others?

3.3.17  11:02 am   "can you please please stop posting hints about the new video on instagram? I can't resist looking at them BUT THEY ARE SPOILING AN AMAZING VIDEO. PLS" i can't tell whether this is just someone asking a really similar question or if you edited my question. if so, why did you edit my question?

3.3.17  10:55 am   hey bill, i am a musician and, like yourself, i am in favour of originality and weird shit, but having jumped into the musician industry i have realised that it primarily consists of sycophants and shallowness which makes me very sad. how do i become successful at music while still being different and happy?
3.3.17  9:16 am   Is it fair to say that this website is the biggest thing to happen to you in the last 5 or so years, and if not what is?

3.3.17  9:10 am   You're incredibly self-motivated in your personal projects. Were you reliant on other people for motivation throughout your life, and if you were how did you change that? For someone like me, whose motivation comes 99% from other people telling me to work on my projects, do you have any tips? How do I become as motivated as you are to work on things?

3.3.17  6:25 am   Is there any process that you use for tagging the videos you use for reality and improv? e.g. "oh, i talk about the video schedule in this one so i should tag it with that".

Also, I know that music is your highest priority, but when it comes to reality, do you know which videos you'll tackle first? (e.g. editing the videos between now and HoJ before going back to what you skipped)
